00008 #ifndef SIMPLENETWLAYER_H_
00009 #define SIMPLENETWLAYER_H_
00010 
00011 #include <omnetpp.h>
00012 #include <cassert>
00013 #include <BaseModule.h>
00014 #include <NetwPkt_m.h>
00015 #include <SimpleAddress.h>
00016 #include <MacControlInfo.h>
00017 
00039 class SimpleNetwLayer : public BaseModule{
00040 //--------members----------
00041 protected:
00042   bool isSwitch;
00044   simtime_t boredTime;
00045 
00046   int maxTtl;
00047 
00048   int ip;
00049 
00050   int dataIn;
00051   int dataOut;
00052 
00053   cMessage* startJabberTimer;
00054 
00055   unsigned long runningSeqNumber;
00056 
00057   typedef std::map<int, int> RoutingTable;
00058 
00059   RoutingTable routingTable;
00060 
00061   enum NetwPktKind{
00062     HELLO_WORLD = 4200,
00063     JABBER,
00064     START_TO_JABBER
00065   };
00066 
00067 //--------methods----------
00068 protected:
00069   void scheduleJabbering(){
00070     if(startJabberTimer->isScheduled()){
00071       cancelEvent(startJabberTimer);
00072     }
00073 
00074     scheduleAt(simTime() + boredTime, startJabberTimer);
00075   }
00076 
00077   void broadcastHelloWorld() {
00078     assert(!ev.isDisabled());
00079     ev << "Broadcasting hello world.\n";
00080     NetwPkt* helloWorld = new NetwPkt("helloWorld", HELLO_WORLD);
00081 
00082     helloWorld->setDestAddr(L3BROADCAST);
00083     helloWorld->setSrcAddr(ip);
00084     helloWorld->setSeqNum(runningSeqNumber++);
00085     helloWorld->setTtl(maxTtl);
00086 
00087     MacControlInfo* cInfo = new MacControlInfo(L2BROADCAST);
00088 
00089     helloWorld->setControlInfo(cInfo);
00090 
00091     getNode()->bubble("Hello World!");
00092 
00093     sendDown(helloWorld);
00094   }
00095 
00096   void sendDown(cPacket* pkt) {
00097     send(pkt, dataOut);
00098   }
00099 
00100   void forwardPacket(NetwPkt* pkt, int nextHop){
00101     NetwPkt* fwd = new NetwPkt(pkt->getName(), pkt->getKind());
00102 
00103     fwd->setDestAddr(pkt->getDestAddr());
00104     fwd->setSrcAddr(pkt->getSrcAddr());
00105     fwd->setSeqNum(pkt->getSeqNum());
00106     fwd->setTtl(pkt->getTtl() - 1);
00107 
00108     MacControlInfo* cInfo = new MacControlInfo(nextHop);
00109 
00110     fwd->setControlInfo(cInfo);
00111 
00112     sendDown(fwd);
00113   }
00114 
00115   void handleHelloWorld(NetwPkt* pkt){
00116 
00117     //who said hello?
00118     int srcIP = pkt->getSrcAddr();
00119 
00120     //we already know ourself...
00121     if (srcIP == ip){
00122       delete pkt;
00123       return;
00124     }
00125 
00126     //do we already know him?
00127     if(routingTable.count(srcIP) == 0){
00128       //if not add him with the mac address of the previous hop
00129       MacControlInfo* cInfo = static_cast<MacControlInfo*>(pkt->getControlInfo());
00130 
00131       int prevHop = cInfo->getNextHopMac();
00132 
00133       routingTable[srcIP] = prevHop;
00134 
00135       char buff[255];
00136       sprintf(buff, "Got hello from %d", srcIP);
00137       getNode()->bubble(buff);
00138       ev << buff << endl;
00139     }
00140 
00141     //if we are a switch and the time to live of the packet
00142     //hasn't exceeded yet forward it
00143     if(isSwitch){
00144       if(pkt->getTtl() > 0) {
00145         forwardPacket(pkt, L2BROADCAST);
00146         char buff[255];
00147         sprintf(buff, "%d said hello!", srcIP);
00148         getNode()->bubble(buff);
00149         ev << buff << endl;
00150       }
00151     } else {
00152       //otherwise reset the bored timer after when we will start jabbering
00153       scheduleJabbering();
00154     }
00155 
00156     delete pkt;
00157   }
00158 
00159   void jabberToSomeone(){
00160     assert(!isSwitch);
00161     assert(routingTable.size() > 0);
00162     int target = intrand(routingTable.size());
00163 
00164 
00165     RoutingTable::const_iterator it = routingTable.begin();
00166     for(int i = 0; i < target; ++i)
00167       ++it;
00168 
00169     ev << "Jabbering - Routingtablesize:" << routingTable.size() << "  target:" << target << "  dest:" << it->first << endl;
00170 
00171     NetwPkt* jabber = new NetwPkt("jabber", JABBER);
00172 
00173     jabber->setDestAddr(it->first);
00174     jabber->setSrcAddr(ip);
00175     jabber->setSeqNum(runningSeqNumber++);
00176     jabber->setTtl(maxTtl);
00177 
00178     MacControlInfo* cInfo = new MacControlInfo(it->second);
00179 
00180     jabber->setControlInfo(cInfo);
00181 
00182     char buff[255];
00183     sprintf(buff, "Babbling with %d", it->first);
00184     getNode()->bubble(buff);
00185     ev << buff << endl;
00186     sendDown(jabber);
00187 
00188     scheduleJabbering();
00189   }
00190 
00191   void handleIncomingJabber(NetwPkt* pkt){
00192     if(isSwitch) {
00193       if(pkt->getDestAddr() != ip){
00194         assert(pkt->getTtl() > 0);
00195         assert(routingTable.count(pkt->getDestAddr()) > 0);
00196 
00197         int nextHop = routingTable[pkt->getDestAddr()];
00198 
00199         char buff[255];
00200         sprintf(buff, "%d babbles with %d", pkt->getSrcAddr(), pkt->getDestAddr());
00201         getNode()->bubble(buff);
00202         ev << buff << endl;
00203 
00204         forwardPacket(pkt, nextHop);
00205       } else {
00206         char buff[255];
00207         sprintf(buff, "%d babbles with me. But I'm a serious switch, I do not babble...", pkt->getSrcAddr());
00208         getNode()->bubble(buff);
00209         ev << buff << endl;
00210       }
00211     } else {
00212       assert(pkt->getDestAddr() == ip);
00213 
00214       char buff[255];
00215       sprintf(buff, "Got babbling from %d", pkt->getSrcAddr());
00216       getNode()->bubble(buff);
00217       ev << buff << endl;
00218     }
00219 
00220     delete pkt;
00221   }
00222 
00223 public:
00224   virtual void initialize(int stage){
00225 
00226     if(stage == 0){
00227       dataOut = findGate("lowerGateOut");
00228       dataIn = findGate("lowerGateIn");
00229 
00230       isSwitch = par("isSwitch").boolValue();
00231 
00232       if(isSwitch)
00233         getParentModule()->getParentModule()->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i",0,"device/accesspoint");
00234 
00235       ip = par("ip").longValue();
00236       maxTtl = par("maxTtl").longValue();
00237       boredTime = par("boredTime").doubleValue();
00238     } else if(stage == 1) {
00239       startJabberTimer = new cMessage("jabber!", START_TO_JABBER);
00240       broadcastHelloWorld();
00241     }
00242   }
00243 
00244   virtual void handleMessage(cMessage* msg){
00245 
00246     switch(msg->getKind()){
00247     case HELLO_WORLD:
00248       handleHelloWorld(static_cast<NetwPkt*>(msg));
00249       break;
00250     case START_TO_JABBER:
00251       jabberToSomeone();
00252       break;
00253     case JABBER:
00254       handleIncomingJabber(static_cast<NetwPkt*>(msg));
00255       break;
00256     default:
00257       error("unknown packet type");
00258       break;
00259     }
00260   }
00261 
00262 
00263 };
00264 
00265 #endif /* SIMPLENETWLAYER_H_ */
